abstract: One day after Eddie Murphy stepped aside as host, the Academy named a replacement who has hosted eight previous Oscar shows, moving quickly to fill a crucial role that was vacated this week.
snippet: One day after Eddie Murphy stepped aside as host, the Academy named a replacement who has hosted eight previous Oscar shows, moving quickly to fill a crucial role that was vacated this week.
lead_paragraph: 5:28 p.m. | Updated Billy Crystal has agreed to take over the role of Oscar host from Eddie Murphy.
